snippet: Gregg Olson, the 1989 American League Rookie of the Year for Baltimore, is now a full-time scout for the San Diego Padres and a budding baseball humorist.
abstract: Gregg Olson, the 1989 American League Rookie of the Year for Baltimore, is now a full-time scout for the San Diego Padres and a budding baseball humorist.

headline.main: Former Reliever Olson Tells Clubhouse Tales
